metadata.title: CVE-2019-3900 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An infinite loop issue was found in the vhost_net kernel module in LinuxKernel up to and including v5.1-rc6, while handling incoming packets inhandle_rx(). It could occur if one end sends packets faster than the otherend can process them. A guest user, maybe remote one, could use this flawto stall the vhost_net kernel thread, resulting in a DoS scenario.
